message: Let's split the money fairly. I'll take 75$, and you'll get 25$. It's a fair deal.
I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. You can have 70, and I'll take 30. It's still a good deal for both of us.
Considering the inflation, here's a new proposal. I'll take 61.25$, and you'll get 38.75$. It's a fair adjustment for the decrease in value.
I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I'll give you 60, and I'll take 40. It's still a decent split considering the inflation.
